title: Math-Boss vs. The Glitch
goal: Survive the Floor Guardian and secure the first major loot drop.
stakes_shift: Artie moves from a lucky survivor to a recognized 'Anomaly' with significant power potential.

bridge.from_prev: The Bone Golem is ready to smash Artie.
bridge.to_next: Artie leaves the crypts with a legendary-tier item that he can't actually use yet.

sections.title: The Dance of Death
sections.intent: A high-stakes combat sequence where Artie must exploit physics to survive a 'Crit-Resist' boss.

scenes.summary: Artie uses the Crypt environment to kite the Bone Golem, using 'Crit-Punches' to chip away at its armor plating.
scenes.outcome: The Golem's armor is shattered, but Artie is running out of stamina.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: Fizz discovers that the Golem has a 'Crit-Resist' buff, making Artie's main offensive tool useless.
scenes.outcome: Artie must find a way to bypass the resistance or die.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: Artie attempts to 'Crit' the ground beneath the Golem, hoping to trigger a physics glitch in the floor geometry.
scenes.outcome: The floor collapses, trapping the Bone Golem in a hole.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.
scenes.end_condition_echo: The floor collapses, trapping the Bone Golem in a hole.

sections.title: The Final Blow
sections.intent: Resolve the boss fight through a comedic System exploit and secure massive XP.

scenes.summary: While the Golem is stuck, Artie spends five minutes 'charging' a punch, which the System misinterprets as a 'Heavy Attack'.
scenes.outcome: Artie prepares his most powerful hit yet.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: Artie lands the hit, but the System rolls a 'Cosmetic Crit,' turning the Golem into a pile of porcelain teacups.
scenes.outcome: The boss is defeated, but the loot is unconventional.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: The System panics during XP recalculation, resulting in Artie jumping five levels instantly due to a rounding error.
scenes.outcome: Artie hits Level 10 instantly after the System panics during XP recalculation.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Artie hits Level 10 instantly after the System panics during XP recalculation.

sections.title: Looting the Teacups
sections.intent: Establish deeper world-building regarding 'First Glitches' and escape Vane's pursuit.

scenes.summary: Artie finds a 'Ring of the Gambler' among the teacups, which doubles crit damage but introduces a self-crit risk.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: A hidden door reveals a mural of the 'First Glitch,' a hero who broke the world in a similar fashion.
scenes.outcome: Artie realizes he isn't the first person to break this game.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: Artie exits the crypt to find Vane waiting, furious that the boss has been cleared in such an 'unprofessional' manner.
scenes.outcome: Vane realizes Artie stole his kill.
scenes.transition_out: This beat carries directly into the next location.

scenes.summary: Artie uses his new level-up speed to outrun Vane's party, heading toward the capital city for safety.
scenes.outcome: Artie uses his new speed to outrun Vane's party toward the capital city.
scenes.end_condition_echo: Artie uses his new speed to outrun Vane's party toward the capital city.
